mapper.select: select o.orderId as orderId, p.productId as productId, p.photo as photo, p.productName as productName, o.quantity as quantity, o.cost as cost from order_detail o, products p where p.productId = o.productId and orderId = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: insert into order_detail (orderId, productId, quantity, cost) values (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{cost})
